Lock

Use the Lock dialog box (Actions | Lock) to lock specific revisions of one or more versioned files or to lock specific revisions of all versioned files in a project or project database. You can lock by revision number, version label, or promotion group.

Locks placed on projects using Serena ChangeMan Version Manager 5.3/6.0 are honored.

Field Descriptions

General Tab
Revision

Either enter the revision number, version label, or promotion group of the revision that you want to lock or click the Browse button to select it. If selecting the revision by a version label, enter a backslash before a version label that begins with a numeric character (such as \1.2label).

Note: By default, Default Revision is the latest revision of a versioned file. Default Revision also can be defined in the project's configuration file to be a version label or a specific revision number.
Lowest-level promotion group This field is only available if the currently selected files are associated with a project database that has a promotion model assigned to it. Select a lowest-level promotion group to associate with the revision you are locking.
Workspace settings may be used to define a Default Promotion Group. If a Default Promotion Group is not defined for the active workspace, Version Manager will either:
  • Prompt you to select a lowest level promotion group, if more than one is defined within the promotion model, or
  • Use the lowest-level promotion group if only one is defined within a promotion model.
Note: This field is not used to select the revision to be locked. To select a revision based on a promotion group, enter a promotion group in the Revision field.
Include files in subprojects This field is only available if a project is selected. Select to lock revisions in subprojects.
Associate Issues If Tracker TrackerLink or TeamTrack SourceBridge is installed, this button displays the association dialog box. You can associate the files you are checking out with issues.
Selected Files Tab
Files List Review the revisions that you have selected to lock.
Properties Click to display the Properties dialog box for either versioned files or projects.
